attributes.action: get recycling in all primary and secondary state schools in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we believe that recycling is a big problem and that one way of trying to combat it would be to target schools as the young people consume a great deal of recycleable paper that is just being thrown away. 
We would do this by making all secondary and primary state schools recycle paper, for no additional cost to them.

government_responses.details:
